text.name: function_lights
text.text: This lamp can be placed anywhere on the map, even inside other objects. Functions are available near the base of each lamp.

text.name: input_changeLightBehavior
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Change the lamp's behavior

text.name: input_changeLightColor
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Change the light's color.

text.name: input_changeLockState
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Change lock state.

text.name: input_changeStepSize
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Change the lamp's height adjustment step size

text.name: input_changeHeightUp
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Move the light upwards

text.name: input_changeHeightDown
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Move the light downwards

text.name: input_changeHeightF1
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Dummy key, for less cluttered help menu. Set to both the up and down key.

text.name: input_changeBrightnessUp
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Increase light brightness

text.name: input_changeBrightnessDown
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Decrease light brightness

text.name: input_changeBrightnessF1
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Dummy key, for less cluttered help menu. Set to both the increase and decrease brightness key.

text.name: input_changeRotationRight
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Rotate right.

text.name: input_changeRotationLeft
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Rotate left.

text.name: input_changeRotationF1
text.text: T93 Placeable lights pack: Dummy key, for less cluttered help menu. Set to both rotate right and rotate left.
